section.section: Subject to the approval of the Governor, the Authority may appoint a full-time or part-time General Counsel.
The General Counsel serves at the pleasure of the Authority.
The Authority shall determine the compensation of the General Counsel.
The General Counsel may not be a member of the Authority.

text.section: The General Counsel, if appointed, is the legal advisor to the Authority and, at the direction of the Authority, shall represent the Authority in judicial or other proceedings.
